httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostCustomers

Creates a new customer object.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\customers HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "address": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "title": "optional_fields_address",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "city": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"
            },
            "country": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"

      "type": "integer",

A negative amount represents a credit that decreases the amount due on an invoice; a positive amount increases the amount due on an invoice."
    },

      "title": "cash_balance_param",

      "maxLength": 256,
